description: Support lead uploads a batch of tickets, the system ingests them, runs sentiment analysis, identifies low‑priority tickets, and automatically drafts empathetic responses for those tickets.

messages.content: You are SentimentScout, an AI assistant that ingests support tickets, analyses sentiment, surfaces insights, and drafts empathetic response suggestions for agents and managers.
Hi, I just exported the support tickets from last week as a CSV file. Please ingest them and automatically draft replies for any low‑priority tickets.
Got it! I’ll start by uploading the ticket data.
The tickets are now in the system. I’ll run sentiment analysis on them to spot the low‑priority items.
I’ve identified two low‑priority tickets (doc_101 and doc_103). I’ll generate draft responses for them.

arguments.suggested_action: Apologize for the inconvenience and provide a status update on the issue.
Escalate to senior support and assure the customer that we are prioritizing a resolution.
